description.message: Video Capture and Screenshot tool and Screen Recorder! Full page screen capture and video record of your screen. Screenshot Capture. Powerful screenshot & screen capture tool, take full page screenshot, annotate your screenshot.

popupDesc1.message: Screenshot will open in a new tab after completion!

popupDesc2.message: Failed to take a screenshot! Try reloading the page.

popupDesc3.message: Cannot take a screenshot of this type due to Google Chrome policy. Try another page in your browser.

rateDialogDesc.message: Naisip mo bang i-rate kami sa Chrome Web Store? Salamat!

rateDialogTitle.message: Kapaki-pakinabang na App para sa iyo?
